name: Floppy Doggo (first Unity project)
description:
tried to stop but couldn't! final cut of my first #unitygame 😁 now with moving background, collectible bones for the #doggo character, high score records 💥 

character design: annhoho (twitter @annhoho2) 

Works on macOS!

background: craftpix.net (https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-horizontal-game-backgrounds) 

music: Lexica (https://epidemicsound.com/artists/lexica/) 

based on tutorial by  @GMTK  

AVAILABLE ONLINE: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/webgl-builds-295746
